Thiner.title: MTO - Mineral Turpentine Oil
Thiner.subtitle: Trusted Industrial Grade Solvent for Multi-Purpose Applications
Thiner.description:
Mumbai, the financial hub of India, is also a major industrial zone with sectors like paint, printing ink, chemicals, textiles, and engineering relying on MTO for thinning, cleaning, and degreasing.
As a trusted MTO Supplier in Mumbai, we deliver high-quality, low-odor, high-solvency Mineral Turpentine Oil in bulk tankers or drums—catering to both small businesses and large-scale industries with reliable and safe supply.
usesdescription: Printing Ink Industries – For ink formulation and cleaning
Chemical Processing – Base solvent in intermediates
Metal Fabrication – Degreasing and surface prep
areanames: Vasai-Virar Belt and New Coastal Industrial MTO zones
Lower Parel, South and Eastern Suburbs

Reducer.title: MTO - Mineral Turpentine Oil
Reducer.subtitle: Trusted Industrial Grade Solvent for Multi-Purpose Applications
Reducer.description:
Navi Mumbai, known as the planned satellite city of India’s financial capital, is also known as one of the key industrial zones in Maharashtra. It has businesses like MTO Paint industry, Printing ink, chemical industries, surfacing of textiles, Textile finishing, Engineering workshops etc. These industries use MTO for critical applications like thinning, cleaning, and degreasing. 
For us, serving these performance specifications is not an issue, because we are known as the best MTO Supplier in Navi Mumbai, where we offer refined low odour high solvency turpentine MTO compliant with industry safety and quality standards. We serve small and mid-sized businesses or larger scale plants, supplying throughout the city in bulk tankers, or even in drums keeping the relation and demand of specific operations in consideration.
Reducer.usesdescription:
• Printing Ink Industries – for ink formulation and cleaning of the machinery
• Chemical Processing Units – base solvent for intermediates and formulations
• Surface Coating and Metal Fabrication – for degreasing, cleaning, and painting prep
• Engineering Workshops – for mechanical cleaning, surface treatment, and parts prep
